name: Visva-Bharati (Amendment) Act, 1984
1: 1. Short title and commencement.-(1) This Act may be called the Visva-Bharati (Amendment) Act, 1984.(2) It shall come into force on such date1 as the Central Government may, by notification in the Official Gazette, appoint.
2: 2. [Substitution of certain expressions for certain other expressions.].-Rep. by the Repealing and Amending Act, 1988 (19 of 1988), s. 2 and the First Schedule (w.e.f. 31-3-1988).
3: 3. [Substitution of new section for section 3.].-Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 31-3-1988).
4: 4. [Insertion of new sections 5A and 5B.].-Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 31-3-1988).
5: 5. [Substitution of new section for section 6.].-Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 31-3-1988).
6: 6. [Substitution of new section for section 10.].-Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid (w.e.f. 31-3-1988).
7: 7. [Substitution of new section for section 12.].-Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 31-3-1988).
8: 8. [Amendment of section 13.].-Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 31-3-1988).
9: 9. [Substitution of new section for section 14.].-Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 31-3-1988).
10: 10. [Omission of section 15.].-Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 31-3-1988).
11: 11. [Substitution of new sections for sections 16 and 17.].-Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid.(w.e.f. 31-3-1988).
12: 12. [Amendment of section 18.].-Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 31-3-1988).
13: 13. [Substitution of new section for sections 19, 20 and 21.].-Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule,ibid. (w.e.f. 31-3-1988).
14: 14. [Substitution of new section for sections 22 and 23.].-Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 31-3-1988).
15: 15. [Amendment of section 24.].- Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 31-3-1988).
16: 16. [Substitution of new section for section 25.].-Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 31-3-1988).
17: 17. [Substitution of new section for section 27.].-Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 31-3-1988).
18: 18. [Amendment of section 28.].-Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 31-3-1988).
19: 19. [Substitution of new sections for sections 29 and 30.].-Rep. by s. 2 and the First Schedule, ibid. (w.e.f. 31-3-1988).1. 8th August, 1984, vide notification No. S.O.584(E), dated 7thAugust, 1984, see Gazette of India, Extraordinary, Part II,sec. 3(ii).
